pages.text: $(li)Arrows serves as ammunition for $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/glowsilk_bow)Glowsilk Bows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbows$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dispenser)Dispensers$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be modified with Potions in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l) to imbue status effects to other creatures.
$(li)You should use $(l:patchouli:perks/jei)JEI$(/l) to search all the arrow variants.
